li.label: Storm Caster
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is more suitable to obtain the Ability to cast Powerful storms Among his enemies. Though only the Avians are Stronger while fighting under Big Storm's. The colonist's with this trait are going to comment on the upcoming weather conditions.

li.label: Adaptive Eyes
li.description: [PAWN_pronoun] Has mutated Eyes that can Adapt in Various light Conditions.
